link:linkbase.xsi:schemaLocation: http://www.xbrl.org/2003/linkbase http://www.xbrl.org/2003/xbrl-linkbase-2003-12-31.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/generic http://www.xbrl.org/2008/generic-link.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/boolean http://www.xbrl.org/2008/boolean-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/formula http://www.xbrl.org/2008/formula.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/assertion/consistency http://www.xbrl.org/2008/consistency-assertion.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/assertion/existence http://www.xbrl.org/2008/existence-assertion.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/assertion/value http://www.xbrl.org/2008/value-assertion.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/variable http://www.xbrl.org/2008/variable.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/period http://www.xbrl.org/2008/period-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/concept http://www.xbrl.org/2008/concept-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/tuple http://www.xbrl.org/2008/tuple-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/dimension http://www.xbrl.org/2008/dimension-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/general http://www.xbrl.org/2008/general-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/label http://www.xbrl.org/2008/generic-label.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/validation http://www.xbrl.org/2008/validation.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/unit http://www.xbrl.org/2008/unit-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2010/message http://www.xbrl.org/2010/generic-message.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/match http://www.xbrl.org/2008/match-filter.xsd

generic:link.msg:message: Value assertion not satisfied '[Report status must be 'Un-Audited'].

Value assertion not satisfied [Total volume of Goods and services under Interbank should be equal to sum of volume of Goods and Services using mobile app and volume of Goods and Services using other channels.]

Value assertion not satisfied [Total volume of Fund transfer under Interbank should be equal to sum of volume of Fund transfer using mobile app, volume of Fund transfer using business correspondent and volume of Fund transfer using other channels.]

Value assertion not satisfied [Total value of Goods and Services under Interbank should be equal to sum of volume of Goods and services using mobile app and volume of Goods and services using other channels.]

Value assertion not satisfied [Total value of Fund transfer under Interbank should be equal to sum of volume of Fund transfer using mobile app, using business correspondent and volume of Fund transfer using other channels.]

Value assertion not satisfied [Total volume of Fund transfer using mobile application under Interbank should be equal to sum of the volume of Fund transfer through RGTS, NEFT, IMPS, UNI and other channels.]

Value assertion not satisfied [Total volume of Fund transfer under Interbank using business correspondent should be equal to sum of the volume of Fund transfer through RGTS, NEFT, IMPS, UNI and other channels.]

Value assertion not satisfied [Total value of Fund transfer using mobile application under Interbank should be equal to sum of the value of Fund transfer through RGTS, NEFT, IMPS, UNI and other channels.]

Value assertion not satisfied [Total value of Fund transfer under Interbank using business correspondent should be equal to sum of the volume of Fund transfer of RGTS, NEFT, IMPS, UPI and other channels.]

Value assertion not satisfied [Total volume of Goods and services under Intrabank should be equal to sum of volume of Goods and Services using mobile application and volume of Goods and Services using other channels.]

Value assertion not satisfied [Total volume of Fund transfer under Intrabank should be equal to volume of Fund transfer using mobile app, Fund transfer using business correspondent and Fund transfer using other channels.]

Value assertion not satisfied [Total value of Goods and services under Intrabank should be equal to sum of volume of Goods and Services using mobile app and volume of Goods and Services using other channels.]

Value assertion not satisfied [Total value of Fund transfer under Intrabank should be equal to volume of Fund transfer using mobile application, volume of Fund transfer using business correspondent and volume of Fund transfer using other channels]
If Volume is entered, corresponding value must be entered and vice versa
'Total number of customers registered for mobile banking services during the period' must be reported.
"Total number of customers registered for mobile banking services at end of the period" must be reported.
"Total number of active customers using bank's mobile banking services" must be reported.
Value assertion not satisfied [No of active customers and Number of customers registered for mobile banking services during the period must be less than the Customers Registered at end of period.]
Value assertion not satisfied [If Volume is greater than 0, corresponding value must be greater than 0 and vice versa]
